options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful Email writer:

draft Email:
Dear [Recipient’s Name], 

I am writing on behalf of the FAST Adventure Society (FAS), FAST NUCES Islamabad. Every 
year, we organize our flagship event, the Adventure Gala – a three-day festival that brings 
together 5,000+ students through adventure sports, cultural evenings, and recreational 
activities. It is one of the most anticipated events on campus, offering brands a vibrant platform 
to connect with youth. 

For this year’s Gala, we are inviting [Company Name] to partner with us as a sponsor. Our 
tailored Gold, Silver, and Bronze packages provide: 

● Extensive on-campus branding (stalls, standees, stage presence) 

● Digital exposure through reels, shoutouts, and collaborations 

● Direct engagement opportunities with students for lead generation and recruitment 

● Exclusive event privileges including VIP access 

We believe this collaboration can offer your brand meaningful visibility while supporting an event 
that fosters leadership, inclusivity, and adventure among students. The detailed proposal is 
attached for your review. 

We would be glad to discuss this further and explore a partnership with [Company Name]. 

Best regards, 
Muhammad Abdullah
FAST NUCES ISB





If the Recipiient name is not defined then start by : To Whom It May Concern,

parameters.subject: Sponsorship Invitation – Adventure Gala 2025 at FAST

json.output:
Dear Ahsan Zia,

I am writing on behalf of the FAST Adventure Society (FAS), FAST NUCES Islamabad. Every year, we organize our flagship event, the Adventure Gala – a three-day festival that brings together 5,000+ students through adventure sports, cultural evenings, and recreational activities. It is one of the most anticipated events on campus, offering brands a vibrant platform to connect with youth.

For this year’s Gala, we are inviting Hum News to partner with us as a sponsor. Our tailored Gold, Silver, and Bronze packages provide:

● Extensive on-campus branding (stalls, standees, stage presence)

● Digital exposure through reels, shoutouts, and collaborations

● Direct engagement opportunities with students for lead generation and recruitment

● Exclusive event privileges including VIP access

We believe this collaboration can offer your brand meaningful visibility while supporting an event that fosters leadership, inclusivity, and adventure among students. The detailed proposal is attached for your review.

We would be glad to discuss this further and explore a partnership with Hum News.

Best regards,
Muhammad Abdullah
FAST NUCES ISB
